DataElement.preferredName: Person Specimen Use Consent Eligibility Determination Code Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The yes/no/not applicable coded response regarding whether the patient has given consent for use of tissue and/or blood samples as required per protocol.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Person Specimen Use Consent Eligibility Determination
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the consent or permission of a person to use a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis as an act of determining if a subject is suitable for enrollment in a study according specific protocol criteria and procedures.

Property.preferredDefinition: A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis.:Use; put into service; make work or employ (something) for a particular purpose or for its inherent or natural purpose.:Permission to do something.:Criteria to determine eligibility of patients for medical care programs and services.

Concepts.definition: A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis.
A manner, or usual, or accepted practice of using something.
The act of determining if a subject is suitable for enrollment in a study according specific protocol criteria and procedures.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Indicator to represent a response of Yes, No, or Not Applicable._The affirmative response to a question or activity._The non-affirmative response to a question._Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context._A system of numbered categories for representation of data.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.:The non-affirmative response to a question.:Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context.:A system of numbered categories for representation of data.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.
The non-affirmative response to a question.
Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.
A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created to support Theradex design of CRFs for NCI CCR trials

ReferenceDocuments.name: Is patient willing to provide
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient willing to provide blood and tissue samples as required per protocol?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient willing to provide tissue samples for correlative research purposes?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 4
ReferenceDocuments.description: If available, is patient willing to release archival tissue sample for research purposes?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient able to understand and is willing to sign a written informed consent documenting their willingness to have their tissue or biologic fluid specimens used for research as outlined in this protocol?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient willing to donate blood and tissue for mandatory correlative research studies?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 5
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient willing to provide tissue and blood samples for mandatory translational research?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 6
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has availability of archival tissue sample been confirmed and patient is willing to release archival tissue sample for research purposes?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 7
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient willing to submit the blood sampling and bone marrow sampling for the PK and PD analyses and exploratory biomarkers?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 11
ReferenceDocuments.description: If the patient will be included in the optional exploratory genetic and biomarker research, does the patient fulfill the following criteria: provision of informed consent for genetic research and provision of informed consent for biomarker research?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 10
ReferenceDocuments.description: If patient is on the expansion phase of the study, is patient willing to provide blood and biopsy samples for research purposes?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 9
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient willing to provide blood and urine samples for research purposes?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 8
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient willing to provide tissue from a recent (within 6 weeks of study entry) archival tissue sample or newly obtained core or excisional biopsy of a tumor lesion?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 12
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient consented to allow mandatory paired (pre- and on- treatment) fresh tissue biopsies if deemed safe to do so for quantitation of Akt pathway signaling proteins?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 13
ReferenceDocuments.description: If patient is greater than or equal to 18 years old and is registered at NCI Clincal Center, is patient willing to provide biopsy samples for research purposes?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 14
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient willing to provide archival FFPE or frozen specimens for central analysis (if available) or if no adequate archival tumor biopsy is available, patients will undergo a new biopsy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 15
ReferenceDocuments.description: If patient is in the expansion phase, is patient willing to provide blood for research purposes (all patients) and new tumor biopsy samples for research purposes?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 16
ReferenceDocuments.description: If patient is in the expansion phase, is patient willing to provide new tumor biopsy samples for research purposes and willingness to provide blood for research purposes (all patients)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 17
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient agreed to provide tissue and blood samples for this study?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 20
ReferenceDocuments.description: If patient is greater than or equal to 18 years old, is patient willing to provide biopsy samples for research purposes?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 19
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient willing to submit blood samples for the integrated biomarker?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 21
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient willing to provide 5 unstained archival slides for pre-treatment 2-HG analysis and correlation with 2-HG levels in pre-treatment frozen specimens?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 23
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient willing to submit a tissue sample to test for expression of mesothelin?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 24
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient willing to provide blood samples for research purposes?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 25
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient willing to submit the blood and bone marrow samples for the PK and PD analyses and exploratory biomarkers?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 18
ReferenceDocuments.description: If patient is in the doublet and triplet expansion cohorts, is patient willing to provide new tumor biopsy samples for research purposes?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 26
ReferenceDocuments.description: If patient is greater than or equal to 18 year of age, is patient willing to provide biopsy samples for research purposes?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 22
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient willing to submit the blood sampling and bone marrow sampling for any mandatory PK and pharmacodynamics analyses and exploratory biomarkers?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 27
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient willing to provide newly obtained core, punch, or excisional biopsy of a tumor lesion obtained up to 28 days prior to treatment initiation?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 28
ReferenceDocuments.description: If in the randomization portion of the study, is patient willing to provide biopsy samples for research purposes?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 29
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient willing to provide archived tissue, if available, from a previous biopsy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 30
ReferenceDocuments.description: For the Dose Finding Cohort only:  Is patient willing and able to provide archival tumor tissue as required per protocol?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 31
ReferenceDocuments.description: For the Dose Expansion Cohort: is the patient willing to provide baseline and 3-week tumor tissue biopsy specimens?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 32
ReferenceDocuments.description: If available, is patient willing to release archival tissue for submission to the EET Biobank?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 33
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient willing to provide biopsy samples for research purposes?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 35
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient willing to provide blood specimens and undergo biopsies for research purposes?
